name: Revolver Widow (Oculus Quest)
description:
This is an Oculus Quest game for use in developer mode (i.e. with SideQuest).

Pick up a revolver and hunt down the Sheriff's killers. 

Test your mettle against the fastest gunfighters in the old west. 

Experience tense shootouts where speed, accuracy and intimidation all play a part. 

Play forever in New Game +
